artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: landscape; thick tree trunk at R with green wooden supports on branches; water in background
inscription: 近江八景の内　唐崎の松　大正七年五月 {Ōmi hakkei no uchi Karasaki no matsu, Taishō shichinen gogatsu} (The Eight Views of Lake Biwa, Pine Trees at Karasaki, May 1918)
markings: red collector seal: 杜品 {Tobin}; on back, red seal: 伊藤深水画　近江八景唐崎　摺刷二百枚限の内　第四十六番 {Itō Shinsui ga, Ōmi hakkei Karasaki shūsatsu nihyaku mai kagiri no uchi, dai yonjūroku ban} (picture by Itō Shinsui, Eight Views of Lake Biwa, Karasaki, printed edition of 200, number 46); red square publisher seals: 版元 {hanmoto} (publisher), ワタナベ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Eight Views of Lake Biwa (Ōmi hakkei no uchi 近江八景の内)
title: Pine Trees at Karasaki
